block.p: Babel Fish, the popular computer-based translator owned by AltaVista, is expanding the number of languages it offers. In addition to the original five language pairs (all of which include English), users of Babel Fish (babelfish.altavista.com) can now translate Russian to English, French to German and German to French. Babel Fish has added World Keyboard, which can write with the native characters of six languages, including Cyrillic letters.
